main.name: Dre Graham
main.description: Welcome to my website! I am an aspiring Cloud Solutions Architect/Engineer and am using this website to showcase my talent. Feel free to click around and have fun!
main.bio: This is my bio which is still in progress...
main.contactmessage: Want to schedule a consultation or have a question? Reach out to me via email or by using the contact form below.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my skills and proficiencies. As a lifelong Learner, I am always looking for new ways to grow my skillset.

education.description: Completed hands-on coursework in Cloud architecture, systems administration, networking, and cybersecurity. Gained experience with AWS and Azure, Linux and Windows server management, resource automation and scaling, and implementing DevOps practices including CI/CD and IaC. Applied ITIL and Agile methodologies in projects involving secure, scalable cloud deployments, database management, and system automation.

work.title: Technical Escalations Specialist, L3
work.description: As a Technical Escalations Specialist L3, I lead complex technical escalations and serve as the highest tier of support. Building upon my previous experience with cloud monitoring tools such as Kibana, CloudWatch, DynamoDB, and SUMO, I now architect comprehensive solutions for enterprise-scale technical challenges. I mentor L1-L2 specialists while collaborating directly with engineering teams to resolve critical system issues and develop permanent fixes. My expertise spans advanced SQL optimization, complex database architecture, and cloud-based monitoring systems, allowing me to drive technical innovation and process improvements across the entire support organization.
